name: ＷＡＶＥ
description:
A simple rhythm game made in about 4 hours for the Music game Jam https://itch.io/jam/musicgamejam

Controls: 
A S D F (You need to press them from left to right at the same time)
R to reset

- and + for volume controls. 0 to mute!

PROTIP: I usually hold A with my pinky at all times, then add the other buttons as I go! Shoutouts to Elysia Griffin twitch.tv/elysiagriffin

Credits:
Music by Alice Mako http://alicemako.newgrounds.com/
Song: Grid Builder http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/729966
Everything else by ninjamuffin99 https://twitter.com/ninja_muffin99
Shoutout to your boy fizzd for putting out a balling tutorial that helped me alot
http://fizzd.newgrounds.com/
http://ludumdare.com/compo/2014/09/09/an-ld48-rhythm-game-part-2/

Whoa cool I wanted to make a rhythm game for such a long time so I decided this game jam was the perfect opportunity! Game jams are cool as heck everyone.

Made with the HaxeFlixel framework: http://haxeflixel.com/

You can grab the source code and do what you want with it: https://github.com/ninjamuffin99/MGJGame
